languages.text: "Мне по душе рвение мальпийцев. Обязую Орден Молота принять сотню новоприбывших в свои ряды. Пусть познают пути друг друга и учатся почитать Когнация по-разному".

"The Malpians display impressive zeal. I charge the Order of the Hammer to welcome one hundred of the new arrivals into their ranks. Let them learn one another's ways and come to accept their distinct paths toward the reverence of Cognatius."
languages.original_text: "Мне по душе рвение мальпийцев. Обязую Орден Молота принять сотню новоприбывших в свои ряды. Пусть познают пути друг друга и учатся почитать Когнация по-разному".

traits.locale_text: "I like the Malfesians' zeal. I charge the Order of the Hammer to welcome a hundred of the new arrivals into their ranks. Let them learn the ways of each other and to revere Cognatius in different ways."

languages.text: “马尔皮人表现的热忱给我留下了深刻的印象。我命令重锤修会欢迎一百名新成员加入他们的队列，让他们学习彼此的理念，接受崇敬科尼亚蒂乌斯的独特道路。”
languages.original_text: "The Malpians display impressive zeal. I charge the Order of the Hammer to welcome one hundred of the new arrivals into their ranks. Let them learn one another's ways and come to accept their distinct paths toward the reverence of Cognatius."

traits.locale_text: “马尔皮人表现的热忱给我留下了深刻的印象。我命令重锤修会欢迎一百名新成员加入他们的队列，让他们学习彼此的理念，接受崇敬科尼亚蒂乌斯的独特道路。”
“马尔皮人表现的热忱给我留下了深刻的印象。我命令重锤修会欢迎一百名新成员加入他们的队列，让他们学习彼此的理念，接受这条崇敬科尼亚蒂乌斯的独特道路。”

languages.text: «Los malpianos muestran un fervor impresionante. Encargo a la Orden del Martillo que acoja en sus filas a cien de los recién llegados. Que cada facción aprenda las costumbres de la otra y acepte las distintas formas de alabar a Cognatius».
languages.original_text: "The Malpians display impressive zeal. I charge the Order of the Hammer to welcome one hundred of the new arrivals into their ranks. Let them learn one another's ways and come to accept their distinct paths toward the reverence of Cognatius."

traits.locale_text: «Los malpianos muestran un fervor impresionante. Encargo a la Orden del Martillo que acoja en sus filas a cien de los recién llegados. Que cada facción aprenda las costumbres de la otra y acepte las distintas formas de alabar a Cognatius».

languages.text: 「マルピ人の熱意は素晴らしい。鉄槌の修道会に100人の新参者をその階級に迎え入れるよう命じる。彼らが互いのやり方を学び、コグナティウス崇拝へと向かうこの明確な道を受け入れるよう促すとしよう」
languages.original_text: "The Malpians display impressive zeal. I charge the Order of the Hammer to welcome one hundred of the new arrivals into their ranks. Let them learn one another's ways and come to accept their distinct paths toward the reverence of Cognatius."

traits.locale_text: 「マルピ人の熱意は素晴らしい。鉄槌の修道会に100人の新参者をその階級に迎え入れるよう命じる。彼らが互いのやり方を学び、コグナティウス崇拝へと向かうこの明確な道を受け入れるよう促すとしよう」
「マルピ人の熱意は素晴らしい。鉄槌の修道会に100人の新参者をその階級に迎え入れるよう命じる。彼らが互いのやり方を学び、コグナティウス崇拝へと向かうこの明確な道を受け入れるよう促すとしよう」

languages.text: « Les Malpiens font montre d'un zèle hors du commun. Je charge l'Ordre du Marteau d'accueillir une centaine de ces nouveaux arrivants dans ses rangs. Que chacun apprenne les us et coutumes de l'autre, et tous emprunteront le glorieux chemin menant à la vénération vertueuse de Cognatius. »
languages.original_text: "The Malpians display impressive zeal. I charge the Order of the Hammer to welcome one hundred of the new arrivals into their ranks. Let them learn one another's ways and come to accept their distinct paths toward the reverence of Cognatius."

traits.locale_text: « Les Malpiens font montre d'un zèle hors du commun. Je charge l'Ordre du Marteau d'accueillir une centaine de ces nouveaux arrivants dans ses rangs. Que chacun apprenne les us et coutumes de l'autre, et tous emprunteront le glorieux chemin menant à la vénération vertueuse de Cognatius. »

languages.text: "Die Malpianer legen einen beeindruckenden Eifer an den Tag. Ich beauftrage den Orden des Hammers, hundert Neuankömmlinge in seine Reihen aufzunehmen. Sie sollen voneinander lernen und ihren einzigartigen Pfad zur Verehrung des Cognatius akzeptieren."
languages.original_text: "The Malpians display impressive zeal. I charge the Order of the Hammer to welcome one hundred of the new arrivals into their ranks. Let them learn one another's ways and come to accept their distinct paths toward the reverence of Cognatius."

traits.locale_text: "Die Malpianer legen einen beeindruckenden Eifer an den Tag. Ich beauftrage den Orden des Hammers, hundert Neuankömmlinge in seine Reihen aufzunehmen. Sie sollen voneinander lernen und ihren einzigartigen Pfad zur Verehrung des Cognatius akzeptieren."

"Die Malpianer legen beeindruckenden Eifer an den Tag. Ich beauftrage den Orden des Hammers, einhundert der Neuankömmlinge in seine Reihen aufzunehmen. Sie sollen voneinander lernen und diesen einzigartigen Pfad zur Verehrung des Cognatius akzeptieren."

languages.text: "Malpililer, etkileyici boyutta gayret sergiliyorlar. Çekiç Tarikatı'nı saflarına yeni gelen yüz mensubu almakla görevlendiriyorum. Birbirlerinin öğretilerini kavrayıp Cognatius'un hürmetine uzanan bu farklı yolu benimsesinler."
languages.original_text: "The Malpians display impressive zeal. I charge the Order of the Hammer to welcome one hundred of the new arrivals into their ranks. Let them learn one another's ways and come to accept their distinct paths toward the reverence of Cognatius."
